attributes.action: Get the prime minister too get the Straphclyde Police to search the Tarry Burn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For over 50 years, the case of Moira Anderson has remained unsolved. There has been many points to the case saying that her remains are buiried in the Tarry Burn, but yet the police will not search it. They should atleast search it and give Moiras family peace. I have mailed Straphclyde Police many of times to get them to search it, because if they do search it - and theres nothing - then they haven't lost anything have they? There is many ways if they do find remains to find out if it is Moiras body - for example: dental records, face remodeling etc.
